Latitude 5520.cpu: 11th Generation Intel Core i3/i5/i7 Processors (Tiger Lake)
Latitude 5520.gpu: Integrated: Intel Iris Xe Graphics or Intel UHD Graphics. Discrete: NVIDIA GeForce MX450 (2 GB GDDR6).
Latitude 5520.ports: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (1x with PowerShare), 2x Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C, Power Delivery, DisplayPort), 1x HDMI 2.0, 1x RJ45 Ethernet, 1x Universal audio jack, 1x microSD-card slot, 1x Wedge-shaped lock slot, Optional Smart card reader.
Latitude 5520.storage_slots: 1x M.2 2230/2280 slot for NVMe SSD (PCIe Gen3 x4 or Gen4 x4). Optional 1x 2.5-inch SATA HDD/SSD bay (may be mutually exclusive with certain battery configurations).
Latitude 5520.screen_options: 15.6-inch displays: HD (1366x768) 220 nits, FHD (1920x1080) 250 nits, FHD (1920x1080) 400 nits Super Low Power, FHD (1920x1080) touch 250 nits, FHD (1920x1080) 300 nits SafeScreen (Privacy). All anti-glare, 60 Hz.
Latitude 5520.webcam: 720p at 30 fps HD RGB Camera, or 720p at 30 fps HD RGB IR Camera (for Windows Hello)
Latitude 5520.biometrics: Optional Fingerprint Reader (integrated into power button), Optional IR Camera (for Windows Hello facial recognition).
Latitude 5520.weight: Starting at 1.59 kg (3.50 lb) for 3-cell battery, M.2 SSD; up to 1.83 kg (4.04 lb) for 4-cell battery, 2.5-inch HDD.
Latitude 5520.wifi_bt: Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (2x2, 802.11ax, Bluetooth 5.1), Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX210 (2x2, 802.11ax, Bluetooth 5.2), or Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211 (2x2, 802.11ax, Bluetooth 5.2).

wwan_modules.module_name: Dell Wireless DW5821e (Qualcomm Snapdragon X20 LTE-A)
wwan_modules.network_speed: LTE-A Cat 16 (up to 1 Gbps DL, 150 Mbps UL)
wwan_modules.tray_pn: Not readily available as standalone P/N (standard Nano-SIM tray)
wwan_modules.status: Available as a factory option, Dell Whitelisted

wwan_modules.module_name: Dell Wireless DW5930e (Qualcomm Snapdragon X55 Global 5G)
wwan_modules.network_speed: 5G NR Sub-6 GHz / LTE-A Pro Cat 22 (up to 7 Gbps DL for 5G, 2.5 Gbps DL for LTE)
wwan_modules.tray_pn: Not readily available as standalone P/N (standard Nano-SIM tray)
wwan_modules.status: Available as a factory option, Dell Whitelisted

Latitude 5520.battery_info: 3-cell, 42 Wh 'smart' lithium-ion or 4-cell, 63 Wh 'smart' lithium-ion, with ExpressCharge and Extend Cycle-life support.
Latitude 5520.expert_notes: WWAN functionality requires factory-installed antennas; retrofitting can be complex if antennas are missing. Only Dell-whitelisted WWAN modules with specific Dell part numbers are guaranteed to work due to BIOS restrictions. The 2.5-inch storage bay is optional and may not be present with larger batteries or specific configurations. Thermal performance with 11th Gen Intel CPUs can be a consideration under heavy load. Thunderbolt 4 ports provide extensive connectivity options.

Latitude 5490.cpu: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 (7th Gen Dual Core or 8th Gen Quad Core), e.g., i5-8250U, i5-8350U, i7-8650U, i3-7130U, i7-7500U, i5-7300U, i3-8130U
Latitude 5490.gpu: Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 620 or Intel HD Graphics 620; Optional Discrete NVIDIA GeForce MX130 (2GB GDDR5)
Latitude 5490.ports: Headphone/microphone combo jack, 2x USB 3.1 Gen 1, 1x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (PowerShare), 1x HDMI, 1x VGA, 1x USB-C (supports DisplayPort Alt Mode), 1x RJ-45 (LAN), 1x SD 4.0 Memory card reader, Optional Smart Card Reader
Latitude 5490.storage_slots: 1x 2.5-inch bay for HDD/SATA SSD, 1x M.2 2280 slot for SATA/PCIe NVMe SSD, WWAN slot can accept M.2 2242 SATA SSD (not NVMe)
Latitude 5490.screen_options: 14-inch HD or Full HD (1920 x 1080) Anti-Glare WVA display with 220 cd/m² brightness; Touch options available
Latitude 5490.biometrics: Optional Fingerprint Reader, Optional Smart Card Reader, Optional Contactless Card Reader
Latitude 5490.wifi_bt: Wi-Fi 5 (802.11 ac) e.g. Intel Wireless-AC 9462, Intel Wireless-AC 8265, Wireless 1820 DW1820; Bluetooth (v4.1 or v4.2 depending on WLAN card)
Latitude 5490.security_tpm: Dell ControlVault 2 with FIPS 140-2 Level 3 Certification
Latitude 5490.battery_info: 3-cell (42Wh, 51Wh) or 4-cell (68Wh) Li-ion. P/Ns: GD1JP (4-cell, 68Wh, Type GJKNX), 45N3J (3-cell, 42Wh, Type 3DDDG), 4YFVG (3-cell, 51Wh, Type 93FTF), D4CMT (3-cell, 51Wh, Type 93FTF).
Latitude 5490.expert_notes: The WWAN slot can accept M.2 2242 SATA SSDs, but not NVMe SSDs, and may not be detected by BIOS in some configurations. Antennas for WWAN might not be present if the laptop did not ship with a WWAN card, and installing them can be difficult. Dell Latitude 5290/5490/5590 models do NOT support the Dell Thunderbolt Dock TB16. [cite: 7 in 1st step search]

Latitude 5420 11th Gen.ports: USB 3.2 Gen 1, USB 3.2 Gen 1 with PowerShare, Two Thunderbolt 4 ports with DisplayPort Alt Mode/USB4/Power Delivery, HDMI 2.0, RJ45 Ethernet port, microSD-card slot, Universal audio port
Latitude 5420 11th Gen.screen_options: 14-inch, HD 1366 x 768, 60 Hz, anti-glare, non-touch, 45% NTSC, 220 nits, wide-viewing angle, 1920 x 1080 IPS display
Latitude 5420 11th Gen.expert_notes: Supports ExpressCharge technology, Meets MIL-STD 810H testing standards

ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.cpu: 11th Generation Intel Core i5 / i7 Processors (e.g., i7-1185G7, i7-1165G7, i5-1145G7, i5-1135G7)
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.gpu: Intel Iris Xe Graphics (Integrated) & NVIDIA T500 (4GB GDDR6) (Discrete)
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.support_os: Windows 11 Pro/Home, Windows 10 Pro/Home, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (certified), Ubuntu (certified)
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.ports: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (one Always On), 2x Thunderbolt 4 / USB4 40Gbps (supports data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort 1.4a), 1x HDMI 2.0, 1x Ethernet (RJ-45), 1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Smart card reader (optional), 1x Nano-SIM card slot (WWAN models)
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.storage_slots: 1x M.2 2280 PCIe Gen 4x4 SSD slot (up to 2TB)
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.screen_options: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) IPS, anti-glare, 300 nits; 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) IPS, anti-glare, 300 nits, touch; 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) IPS, anti-glare, 500 nits, Low Power, X-Rite Factory Color Calibration; 15.6" UHD (3840x2160) IPS, anti-glare, 600 nits, HDR400, X-Rite Factory Color Calibration
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.webcam: HD 720p with ThinkShutter / HD 720p + IR with ThinkShutter
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.biometrics: Touch style Fingerprint Reader (match-on-chip), IR Camera for Windows Hello
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.wifi_bt: Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX210, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.2 (or Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.2)

wwan_modules.status: Available (requires WWAN antennas if not pre-installed)
Available (requires WWAN antennas if not pre-installed)

ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.power_watts: 65W USB-C (standard) / 95W USB-C (for models with NVIDIA T500)
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.power_pn: Not specified, uses standard Lenovo USB-C power adapters compatible with listed wattage.
ThinkPad P15s Gen 2.expert_notes: WWAN functionality requires the installation of a compatible WWAN module and may require a separate WWAN antenna kit if the laptop was not originally configured for WWAN. The system has 16GB of RAM soldered to the motherboard, with one SODIMM slot for expansion. Only one M.2 2280 SSD slot is available for storage.
pdf_links: [ThinkPad P15s Gen 2 / T15 Gen 2 Hardware Maintenance Manual (HMM)](https://download.lenovo.com/pccbbs/mobiles_pdf/p15s_gen2_t15_gen2_hmm_en.pdf)

ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.cpu: Intel 8th Generation Core i3/i5/i7 (e.g., i5-8500T, i7-8700T)
ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.sub_model: N/A (Specific generation based on CPU, generally 2018-2020)
ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.lifecycle: End of Life / Discontinued (Replaced by newer generations)
ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.support_os: Windows 10, potentially Windows 11 via compatibility checks
ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.ports: USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Type-A & Type-C), HDMI, DisplayPort, Ethernet (RJ-45), Audio combo jack, Optional Serial port or second video out.
ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.storage_slots: 1x M.2 2280 (PCIe NVMe or SATA) and/or 1x 2.5" SATA drive bay (optional)
ThinkCentre M920q Tiny.biometrics: Optional Fingerprint Reader (FPR) as a top cover accessory.

ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.cpu: Intel 8th Gen Core i3/i5/i7 (e.g., i5-8400T, i7-8700T)
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.support_os: Windows 10/11, Linux (Check PSREF for specific versions)
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.ports: Front: 2x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (one is always on), 1x USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 1, Headphone/mic combo. Rear: 4x USB 3.1 Gen 1, HDMI, DisplayPort, RJ45 Ethernet, Optional Serial Port/VGA/DP/HDMI.
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.ram_max: Up to 64GB (Verified via PSREF for similar Tiny models, although 32GB is often the practical limit for 8th Gen)
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.storage_slots: 1 x M.2 2280 slot (for SSD/nvme) AND 1 x optional  2.5-inch bay (for HDD/SSD via adapter cable) ,need caddy
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.wifi_bt: Optional - Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 9260 (or similar M.2 2230 card)
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.power_connector: External AC Adapter (Standard Lenovo slim tip)
ThinkCentre M720q Tiny.power_pn: ADLX65YCC3A (65W) or ADLX90YCC3A (90W) - check specific region/adapter type

ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 6.cpu: Intel Core i5/i7 (11th Generation - Tiger Lake UP3)
ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 6.ports: 2x Thunderbolt 4 / USB 4.0 (Type-C), 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A (one always on), 1x HDMI 2.0, 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, Optional Nano-SIM slot.
ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 6.screen_options: 14-inch, 16:10 aspect ratio, Options include: 1920x1200 (FHD+), 2880x1800 (WQUXGA) or 2240x1440 (WQHD+), various brightness/touch/privacy options.
ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 6.biometrics: Touch FPR (Fingerprint Reader) and IR Camera for Windows Hello
ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 6.expert_notes: This model uses LPDDR4x RAM which is soldered to the motherboard, making RAM upgrades impossible. WWAN compatibility is highly dependent on the specific BIOS whitelist and WWAN module installed at the factory or purchased as an official FRU. Ensure the required antennas are present if installing WWAN post-purchase.

ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9.ports: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (1 Always On), 2x Thunderbolt 4 (USB4 40Gbps, support PD 3.0, DP 1.4), HDMI 2.0b, Headphone/Mic combo jack, Optional Nano-SIM slot.
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9.screen_options: 14.0" 16:10, resolutions including 1920x1200 (FHD+), 2560x1600 (WQHD+), 3840x2400 (4K UHD+), various brightness/touch options.
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9.biometrics: Touch Style Fingerprint Reader (FPR) and/or IR Camera for Facial Recognition
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9.wifi_bt: Intel AX201 or AX210 (Wi-Fi 6 or 6E) and Bluetooth 5.1/5.2
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9.expert_notes: The X1 Carbon Gen 9 switched to a 16:10 aspect ratio screen. WWAN M.2 slot configuration (including required antennas) must be verified against the specific FRU/MTM before ordering parts. RAM is soldered, making upgrades impossible.

ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.cpu: Up to 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processor / Up to AMD Ryzen 7 Pro processors
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.gpu: Intel UHD Graphics (integrated) / AMD Radeon Graphics (integrated)
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.support_os: Windows 10 Pro, Windows 10 Home, Linux, Ubuntu Linux
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.ports: 2x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (one Always On), 1x USB-C 3.1 Gen 1 (power delivery and DisplayPort), 1x USB-C 3.1 Gen 2 / Thunderbolt 3 (power delivery and DisplayPort), HDMI 2.0,  microphone combo jack
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.ram_slots: Memory soldered to systemboard, no slots
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.storage_slots: One drive, up to 2TB M.2 2280 SSD  NVMe, PCIe 3.0 x4
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.biometrics: Fingerprint Reader (optional) / IR camera for Windows Hello (optional)
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.wifi_bt: Intel AX201 11ax, 2x2 + BT5.0 / Intel AX200 11ax, 2x2 + BT5.1 / Mediatek Wi-Fi 6 MT7921, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1 / Realtek Wi-Fi 6 RTL8852AE, 802.11ax Dual Band 2x2 Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 5.1
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.security_tpm: Firmware TPM 2.0 integrated in chipset / Discrete TPM 2.0, TCG certified
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.power_pn: ADLX65YCC2D, ADLX65YLC2D, ADLX65YDC2D, adlx65ylc3a, adl65ydc3a, adlx65yac3a, adlx65ycc3a
ThinkPad T14s Gen 1.expert_notes: RAM is soldered and not upgradable. WWAN is optional. The Intel version has Thunderbolt 3, while the AMD version has HDMI 2.0

ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.cpu: Up to 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processor (e.g., Core i5-10210U, Core i5-10310U, Core i7-10510U, Core i7-10610U)
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.ports: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (one Always On), 2x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 / Thunderbolt™ 3 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort™ 1.2), 1x HDMI 1.4b,  1x Nano-SIM card slot (WWAN models only), 1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x Side docking connector, 1x Kensington® Security Slot™'
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.storage_slots: One M.2 2280 slot for NVMe PCIe SSD, up to 2TB
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.screen_options: ['14.0” 4K (3840x2160) Dolby Vision™ HDR, WVA, 1500:1 contrast, 90% gamut, 500 nits', '14.0” WQHD (2560x1440), WVA, 1000:1 contrast, 72% gamut, 300 nits', '14.0” FHD (1920x1080) PrivacyGuard, WVA, 1500:1 contrast, 72% gamut, 500 nits (touch)', '14.0” FHD (1920x1080), WVA, 700:1 contrast, 72% gamut, 400 nits (touch)', '14.0" FHD (1920x1080) IPS 400nits Anti-glare']
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.webcam: HD 720p with ThinkShutter, optional IR camera for facial recognition
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.biometrics: Touch style fingerprint reader on palm rest (match-on-chip), optional IR camera for facial recognition
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.security_tpm: Firmware TPM 2.0 integrated in chipset / Discrete TPM 2.0
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.power_pn: 65W: 5A10W86253-BTI (example, BTI branded), 45W: Not explicitly specified in PSREF, generic Lenovo 45W USB-C adapters are compatible
ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8.expert_notes: RAM is soldered to the systemboard and is not upgradable. The WWAN module is an M.2 4G/LTE card. Upgrading to a 5G WWAN module from Gen 8 4G is unlikely without also replacing the antenna and potentially encountering software/firmware compatibility issues due to different motherboard chipsets.

ThinkBook 14s Yoga ITL.ports: ['2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1', '1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (Supports DisplayPort and 65 W Power Delivery)', '1 x Thunderbolt 4 (Supports DisplayPort and 65 W Power Delivery)', 'HDMI 1.4', 'MicroSD card reader', 'Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)']
ThinkBook 14s Yoga ITL.storage_slots: Up to two drives, 2x M.2 SSD
ThinkBook 14s Yoga ITL.screen_options: 14" FHD (1920x1080) IPS, Touchscreen, 300nits, 100% sRGB, Dolby Vision
ThinkBook 14s Yoga ITL.expert_notes: The ThinkBook 14s Yoga ITL is a 2-in-1 laptop designed for business and creative use, featuring a touchscreen and 360-degree hinge. It has a 14-inch FHD IPS display, Intel Core i5 or i7 processors, and Intel Iris Xe Graphics. It supports up to 40GB of RAM and has two M.2 SSD slots. It includes a ThinkBook Yoga Integrated Smart Pen

ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.cpu: Up to 11th Gen Intel Core i7-1185G7 vPro (options include Intel Core i5-1135G7, i7-1165G7)
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.gpu: Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics (functions as UHD Graphics on i5/single-channel RAM configurations), Optional NVIDIA GeForce MX450 2GB GDDR6
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.ports: ['2x Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C)', '2x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 (one Always On)', '1x HDMI 2.0', '1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)', '1x MicroSD Card Reader', '1x Ethernet (RJ-45)', '1x Side docking connector', 'Optional Smart card reader']
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.ram_slots: One memory soldered to systemboard, one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.storage_slots: One M.2 2280 PCIe Gen 3x4 slot, supports M.2 2242/2280 SSD (up to 2TB M.2 2280 SSD or 128GB M.2 2242 SSD)
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.screen_options: ['14" UHD (3840x2160) IPS 500nits Anti-glare, HDR 400, Dolby Vision™', '14" FHD (1920x1080) Low Power IPS 400nits Anti-glare', '14" FHD (1920x1080) IPS 300nits Anti-glare', '14" FHD (1920x1080) IPS 500nits, PrivacyGuard with PrivacyAlert (touch optional)']
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.biometrics: Optional Fingerprint Reader (Touch style, match-on-chip or FIPS 201), Optional IR camera for facial recognition (Windows Hello)
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.wifi_bt: Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX210 / Wi-Fi 6 AX201, 2x2, Bluetooth 5.2
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.power_pn: Compatible part numbers: 4X20M26272, 4X20M26268, 01FR024, 01FR025, 01FR030, 02DL155, ADLX65YDC3A, ADLX65YLC3A, ADLX65YSDC3A, ADLX65YSCC3A, SA10M13945, SA10R16897, SA10R16901, GX20P92530
ThinkPad T14 Gen 2i.expert_notes: WWAN modules require whitelisting by Lenovo BIOS. Some RAM is soldered to the systemboard. Specific port availability may vary by model configuration. Intel Iris Xe Graphics capability requires system to be configured with dual-channel memory; with single-channel memory, Intel Iris Xe Graphics will function as Intel UHD Graphics. WWAN is NOT available for aluminium models. Smart card reader is NOT available with FIPS 201 fingerprint reader and anti-microbial covers.

ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.cpu: AMD Ryzen™ 5/7 PRO Series or 12th Generation Intel Core i5/i7 Processor
ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.gpu: Integrated AMD Radeon™ 660M/680M Graphics or Intel Iris Xe Graphics
ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.ports: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On), 2x Thunderbolt 4 / USB4® 40Gbps, 1x HDMI, Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.webcam: FHD 1080p + IR hybrid, with privacy shutter, or FHD 1080p, with privacy shutter, or HD 720p, with privacy shutter
ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.wifi_bt: Intel® Wi-Fi® 6E AX211, 802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi® + Bluetooth® 5.1 (Bluetooth® 5.2 hardware ready) or MediaTek Wi-Fi® 6E RZ616
ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.security_tpm: Discrete TPM 2.0 and Microsoft Pluton TPM 2.0
ThinkPad T14s Gen 3.expert_notes: WWAN is an optional feature. Some configurations may not include it.  WWAN upgrades are possible, but may require additional antennas and components. The AMD version may have limited WWAN options.

ThinkCentre M70q Tiny Gen 2/11DU.ports: Front: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1 x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, headphone/microphone combo. Rear: 3 x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1 x DisplayPort, 1 x HDMI, 1 x RJ45
ThinkCentre M70q Tiny Gen 2/11DU.power_pn: Various, check the back of the PC for input
ThinkCentre M70q Tiny Gen 2/11DU.expert_notes: The M70q Tiny is a compact desktop PC known for its enterprise-level performance and upgradeability. It supports up to three monitors. It is compatible with Windows 10 and Windows 11. It is also tested against military-grade requirements for durability

ThinkCentre M70q Tiny Gen 2.cpu: Up to 11th Gen Intel Core i9
ThinkCentre M70q Tiny Gen 2.ports: Front: USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, USB-A 3.2 Gen 2, Headphone/mic combo. Rear: 2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 2, 2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1, DisplayPort, HDMI, RJ45
ThinkCentre M70q Tiny Gen 2.expert_notes: Tool-less access for SSD and memory module. Supports up to 3 independent monitors.

EliteDesk 800 G4 Mini.ports: Front: 1 x USB-C 3.1 Gen 2, 2 x USB 3.1 Gen 1, 1 x USB 3.1 Gen 2; Rear: 2 x DisplayPort 1.2, 2 x USB 3.1 Gen 2, 2 x USB 3.1 Gen 1, 1 x RJ45 (Gigabit Ethernet), Headphone and Headset jacks
EliteDesk 800 G4 Mini.storage_slots: 2 x M.2 2230/2280 (for storage), 1 x 2.5" SATA drive bay optional
EliteDesk 800 G4 Mini.expert_notes: Supports up to 32GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM.  Has two M.2 slots for storage.  Can be mounted behind a monitor.  Supports Windows 11.  Uses an external power supply.  Optional Thunderbolt card

EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini.gpu: Intel UHD Graphics 630 (integrated), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti (optional)
EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini.ports: 2 x DisplayPort 1.4, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-A, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-A, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C, 1 x RJ45, 1 x Headphone Jack
EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini.storage_slots: 1 x M.2 2230 (for WLAN), 2 x M.2 2242/2280 (for storage), 1 x 2.5" HDD bay
EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini.wifi_bt: Optional Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (2x2) and Bluetooth 5 combo
EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini.power_pn: L89697-001 (150W AC Adapter PFC Smart 7.4mm Slim)
EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini.expert_notes: The HP EliteDesk 800 G6 Mini is a compact desktop designed for business use, offering a range of configuration options. It supports up to 64GB of RAM and has multiple storage slots. Security features include TPM 2.0 and HP Wolf Security. It supports Windows 10 and 11. WWAN is not a standard feature.
